name: Uganda Macro Data Portal
description: Portal providing access to timely and highly structured macroeconomic and financial data on Uganda, published by the Ministry of Finance, Planning and Economic Development (MoFPED). Allows staff and the general public to explore data relating to Uganda's macroeconomic and financial indicators, including results of econometric tests such as the Phillips-Ouliaris Cointegration Test.
owner_name: Ministry of Finance, Planning and Economic Development (MoFPED)
